This app's lack of a "Night Mode" is surprising, as this feature is essential for nighttime usage. "Night Mode" adjusts the colour scheme to reduce blue light, making it easier on the eyes in low-light conditions, like during the night. Its absence in the app affects usability for night users.

Amazon for Tablets not working To fix this: 1) Go to settings. Apps. Amazon. You will see all your saved items and past purchases as before.
